sa(gm)hiqtA&si# viSvarUqpIrA mOqrjA viqSA &&*gau#paqtyEnA &&*rAqyaspOShE#Na sahasrapOqShaM ~Mva#H puShyAsaqM mayi# vOq rAya#H SrayantAM ||
upa# tvA&gnE diqvEdi#vEq dOShA#vastarddhiqyA vaqyaM | namOq Bara#ntaq Ema#si || 
rAja#ntamaddhvaqrANA$M gOqpAmRuqtasyaq dIdi#viM | varddha#mAnaq(gg)q svE damE$ ||
sa na#H piqtEva# sUqnavE&gnE# sUpAyaqnO Ba#va | saca#svA naH svaqstayE$ || agnEq - [  ] 22
